scripts.dev:macos: npm i && concurrently -n "client,server" -c "bgMagenta,cyan" "npm run dev:client:macos" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.dev:windows: npm i && concurrently -n "client,server" -c "bgMagenta,cyan" "npm run dev:client:windows" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.dev:client:macos: cd client && npm i && export NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://localhost:3200 && npm run dev
scripts.dev:client:windows: cd client && npm i && set "NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://localhost:3200" && npm run dev
scripts.dev:server: cd server && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.start:client: cd client && npm i && npm run start
scripts.start:server: cd server && npm i && npm run start
